name: Pou Up Parkuor
description:
In this game you as a Pou character from the Pou game, you have to finish this game by jumping from one platform to another, and see what's in the ending... -Controls (For PC)-
  • A = Walk Left
  • D = Walk Right
  • Space = Jump
  • ESC = Exit Game
In this game there are no checkpoints, so you have to keep your balance... Games for Windows require a rather powerful PC, because in this game I use a lot of post processing... so sorry if you can't play it yet... But you can download the Android version, it's light, ONLY 18MB =D
